**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Quercus garryana</b></i> is an oak tree species of the Pacific Northwest, with a range stretching from southern California to southwestern British Columbia. It is commonly known as the <b>Garry Oak, Oregon white oak</b> or <b>Oregon oak</b>.
